sentences.english: At that time, I still don't know the father of the young imports.
sentences.chinese: 當時，我年幼還不知道父親的用意何在。

sentences.english: I have been young, and now am old;
sentences.chinese: 我從前年幼，現在年老，卻未見過義人被棄。

sentences.english: Big boys sometimes domineer over the younger pupils.
sentences.chinese: 大男孩有時會蠻橫地對待較年幼的小學生。

sentences.english: I thus began my schooling at an extremely tender age.
sentences.chinese: 我就這樣在極其年幼的時期開始了我的學校教育。

sentences.english: I was young, passionate, and believed in all the "impossibles".
sentences.chinese: 那時的我年幼，激情四射，並且相信一切“不可能”。

sentences.english: But I being young and foolish, with her did not agree.
sentences.chinese: 但年幼無知的我啊，卻不同意她這麼說。

sentences.english: All this was young little red peach see in the eye.
sentences.chinese: 這一切都被年幼的小紅桃看在眼裏。

sentences.english: The story shows the growth of an innocent boy.
sentences.chinese: 這個故事顯示了一個年幼無知的男孩的成長。

sentences.english: Zhou gong was very diligent at government matters when assisting young King Cheng. He tried to attract talents widely.
sentences.chinese: 周公輔佐年幼的成王時，勤於政事，廣泛招攬人才。

sentences.english: I must get aid soon. Boo is too young to have to avenge me.
sentences.chinese: 我必須儘快獲得醫療，布布還太年幼無法幫我報仇。

sentences.english: Her first husband died from a brain tumor and she was left with three small children.
sentences.chinese: 她第一任丈夫死於腦瘤，給她留下了三個年幼的孩子。

sentences.english: Or possibly the most dangerous, do you simply drive while teenaged?
sentences.chinese: 又或者最危險的就是年幼的時候開車？

sentences.english: If you come across a muddle-headed girl, it may be her.
sentences.chinese: 年幼的皇帝胡亥是個頭腦糊塗，沒有才能的統治者。

sentences.english: Then baby Brutus came into his life.
sentences.chinese: 後來，年幼的布魯特斯走進了他的生活。

sentences.english: Pan missed his wife and two small daughters terribly.
sentences.chinese: 潘文石非常思念自己的妻子和兩個年幼的女兒。

sentences.english: She was now the carer of her three younger siblings.
sentences.chinese: 她現在照顧着三個年幼的兄弟姐妹。

definition: to be orphaned of one's father
